text: Pink Cadillac is a 1989 action comedy movie. The movie is about white supremacists from whom a woman tries to get away driving a pink Cadillac. Clint Eastwood, Bernadette Peters, Geoffrey Lewis, and Frances Fisher have roles in this comedy. The reviews of Pink Cadillac were negative. Its box office intake was very weak. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1989 comedy movies Category:1989 action movies Category:1989 crime movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Buddy Van Horn Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies set in Las Vegas
title: Pink Cadillac (movie)
